title: Windows 7 SP 1 x86 latest updates paradox_x {Team os}
description:
Year: 2014
Platform: h86/h64
Language: English / Russian


System requirements:

1 GHz processor and a 32-bit (x86))
Hard disk. 16 GB of free disk space (32-bit)
Disc media. To work with a DVD-disk or CD-ROM requires a compatible optical drive.
Graphics adapter. Depending on the resolution for video playback require additional memory and advanced graphics hardware.
Memory. 1 GB RAM (32-bit) 
Monitor. DirectX 9 graphics processor with WDDM 1.0 driver or later
Sound card. Music and sound require audio output.

Description:
Original version with two clean interface languages Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹and updates on March 28, 2014 are pleased to offer you the operating system Ã‚Â«Windows 7 Ultimate" Service Pack 1 (SP1), which (according to numerous requests and desires) manually with a maximum precision built only official updates Microsoft and in which languages Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹can choose between English and Russian.

Windows 7 Ultimate - the most complete version for home users who want all the features of Windows, including all that is included in the Home Premium and Enterprise, without having to enter into a separate license agreement.

The main distinguishing features of Windows 7:
DirectAccess - provides mobile users secure access to corporate networks from the Internet without the need to create a virtual private network (VPN).
BitLocker and BitLocker To Go - helps to protect data on PCs and removable drives, if necessary, to force encryption and creates backup copies of keys for data recovery.
BranchCache - reduces the time users of the branches of the company spend on downloading files over the network.
Enterprise Search Scopes - provides one simple interface for finding information on the corporate network, including sites SharePoint.
AppLocker - allows the administrator through a centrally managed, but flexible group policies to determine which applications can and can not be run on the user's PC.
Improvements in technology deployment for virtual environments Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) - Updated interface VDI includes support for multiple monitors and microphones. Also possible to use images of the virtual machine to boot physical PC.
Subsystem for UNIX-Based Applications (SUA) - Subsystem for Unix-based application facilitates the integration between Windows and UNIX / Linux-environment.
Multilingual User Interface (MUI) - the ability to create a single image for all language versions and all types of hardware (desktop, laptop, Tablet PC), which will provide a more convenient and rapid deployment of the operating system. And then, if necessary, users can switch the operating system interface (eg menus, dialog boxes, files, training and support) to any of the supported languages.

Features:
Are based on the original images
At installation it is possible to select a language: English or Russian
Integrated the official updates from Microsoft (except regarding Windows Defeneder and. Net Framework) on 03/28/2014. One update can not be integrated into the distribution.
Updates KB2882822, KB2859537 and KB2872339 are also integrated, but the error 0xc0000005 when running applications will not arise. In other words, the command bcdedit in cmd, you will not find a string kernel xNtKrnl.exe, since the kernel is not modified, and therefore fulfill the update correctly. Previous versions of this assembly, you can also easily upgrade by installing all the updates - the situation is similar.
Integrated Internet Explorer 11.0.4
User Account Control (UAC) is turned off
Some automation installation: do not accept the license agreement, sewn key, but still requires activation, which is in this publication

Changes compared to the previous version:
Integrated the official update on 28/03/2014
Integrated Internet Explorer 11.0.4

The procedure for treatment:
Activating Windows Loader 2.2.1 by DAZ in the folder with the images.
